scripts.build-web-electron: flutter build web --release && terser build/web/head.js -o build/web/head.js && terser build/web/dark.js -o build/web/dark.js && terser build/web/firebase.js -o build/web/firebase.js && terser build/web/flybis.js -o build/web/flybis.js && terser build/web/public/firebase-messaging-sw.js -o build/web/public/firebase-messaging-sw.js && terser build/web/electron-firebase-messaging-sw.js -o build/web/electron-firebase-messaging-sw.js && terser build/web/main.dart.js -o build/web/main.dart.js && terser build/web/flutter_service_worker.js -o build/web/flutter_service_worker.js && terser build/web/worker.js -o build/web/worker.js && terser build/web/adsense.js -o build/web/adsense.js && cd react && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run start
scripts.deploy-web: npm run build-web-electron && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-firebase: npm run deploy-web && npm run deploy-functions
